meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I can keep up in this major
meeting_request.description: Hi, I’m Bryce, a third-year Political Science major. I’ve taken a bunch of political science and international relations courses, but I’m finding it harder than ever to keep up with the content and the pace. Some of the classes even cover topics I don’t really care about, like immigration or human rights. I’m feeling frustrated and worried that I’m not doing well in this major, and I’m having a hard time expressing how much it’s been affecting me. I’d love to talk with someone about how to stay engaged in this coursework and improve my academic performance, but I don’t know where to find an honest counselor like you.
